attributes.action: save 7 Regiment AAC (V) from being cut
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 7 Regiment AAC(V) is the only TA helicopter unit and is due to be disbanded March 09 at a time when the Forces are short of Helicopters. Although 7 Regiment doesn't have a deployable role, it provides vital support to ongoing missions in Iraq and Afghanistan.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
